commands.commandLine: mkdir -p /projects/che-docs/target; cd /projects/che-docs/target ; jekyll serve -s /projects/che-docs/src/main --force_polling --host $(/sbin/ifconfig eth1 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2)
commands.name: Che Jekyll Serve Full

commands.commandLine: mkdir -p /projects/che-docs/target; cd /projects/che-docs/target ; jekyll serve -s /projects/che-docs/src/main --force_polling --incremental --host $(/sbin/ifconfig eth1 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2)
commands.name: Che Jekyll Serve Incremental

commands.commandLine: while true; do unison -auto=true -log=false -retry 10 -silent=true -watch=true -force /projects/che-docs/src/main/_docs/ /projects/che-docs/src/main/_docs/ /projects/codenvy-docs/src/main/_docs/che/ > /dev/null 2>&1; unison -auto=true -log=false -retry 10 -silent=true -watch=true -ignore 'Path codenvy' -force /projects/che-docs/src/main/_docs/assets/imgs /projects/che-docs/src/main/_docs/assets/imgs /projects/codenvy-docs/src/main/_docs/assets/imgs> /dev/null 2>&1; echo 'Synced. Sleeping for 2 seconds.'; sleep 2;done;
commands.name: Codenvy Unison OneWay

commands.commandLine: mkdir -p /projects/codenvy-docs/target/docs/che; sleep 2; jekyll serve -s /projects/codenvy-docs/src/main -d /projects/codenvy-docs/target/ --force_polling --incremental --port 8080 --host $(/sbin/ifconfig eth1 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2)
commands.name: Codenvy Jekyll Serve Incremental

commands.commandLine: mkdir -p /projects/codenvy-docs/target/docs/che; sleep 2; jekyll serve -s /projects/codenvy-docs/src/main -d /projects/codenvy-docs/target/ --force_polling  --port 8080 --host $(/sbin/ifconfig eth1 | grep 'inet addr:' | cut -d: -f2)
commands.name: Codenvy Jekyll Serve Full

commands.commandLine: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libcurl3 && sudo gem install html-proofer && mkdir -p /projects/link-checker && cd /projects/che-docs/target/_site/docs && htmlproofer --assume-extension . &> /projects/link-checker/che-docs-errors.log && cd /projects/codenvy-docs/target/_site/docs && htmlproofer  --assume-extension . &> /projects/link-checker/codenvy-docs-errors.log
commands.name: HTMLProofer

commands.commandLine: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libcurl3 && sudo gem install html-proofer && mkdir -p /projects/link-checker && cd /projects/codenvy-docs/target/docs && (htmlproofer  --assume-extension . &> /projects/link-checker/codenvy-docs-errors.log)
commands.name: HTMLProofer Codenvy

commands.commandLine: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libcurl3 && sudo gem install html-proofer && mkdir -p /projects/link-checker && cd /projects/che-docs/target/_site/docs && (htmlproofer  --assume-extension . &> /projects/link-checker/che-docs-errors.log)
commands.name: HTMLProofer Che
